text: I Wish I Could Go Back, To When This Game Was First Released.
author: Akira Kamisaru

text:
Hey guys. Remember when Patriarch Sergius destroyed an entire planet and summoned a superweapon that can teleport a bullet directly into the brain of anyone in the universe?

Anyone? Dammit, this was a filler arc, wasn't it?
author: KyazuTheInsane

text: this here... easily ranks up there in some of my absolute favorite music... regardless of genre. i usually play this when i'm trying to sleep lately. even still, before i had the mp3 on my computer i would leave the game on in this area and listen until i got tired of the song.

text: Nice Music - good taste - compliment SupraDarky

text: Reminds me of FF8 in parts.
author: Miikhiel Aali

text: Xenosaga Episode II has one of the worst soundtracks imo.  'Minor Boss Battle' and that song during the final fight with Albedo aren't terrible, but otherwise I would strongly refer anybody to the ost of Episode I.
author: fate255

text: It's definitely a ymmv thing, but I liked how booming and epic it was at times. The music in Labyrinthos was my favorite.
author: Kevin M Packard

text: Worst maybe, but still good. It goes well with the high-tech/future sci-fi setting of the game.

text: ah yes, episode 1's ost, with a whopping 5 tracks

text: markasscop Arev lmao this is exactly what I thought the entire time playing episode I. Episode ii’s soundtrack is dope and super interesting. OP is tripping

text: Im tapping my feet to this one I like it alot!!! never played Xenosaga II..time to look for a PS-2 thanks to this one it just feels right!!!

text: ........you're an odd one.i dunno WHERE the similarities are,seriously.
author: SirenoftheVoid

text: Y'know, I really enjoyed Episode 2's music I only wished that the cutscene variants of some of the songs were out but they were never really released and I think the songs are only in the cutscenes so they can't be ripped out like all the other bgms :( Of course, I loved the entire saga series music, Mitsuda, Hosoe, Kajiura were wonderful in making such music and I can only hope they can continue with the new "X" games
author: Bek Man

text: I have used Electric Power building many times for the same purpose! All thanks to you of course. Your list is like a coding soundtrack.

text: nah they're completely unrelated outside of xenoblade using some machine designs from xenogears

text: Definitely, the beginning sounds very similar to the dungeon theme in zelda 3: a link to the past. I dont think i've ever played any games from the xenosaga series but i feel like i've missed out from what i've heard from the ost so far. I loved the game xenoblade though does anyone know if that's meant to be a prequel or sequel to the xenosaga series or are they completely unrelated?
author: LOUMAYN

text: This seems to put me in a dark unworldly place. Everything around me is drowning within a secluded void of deep thought. Dark clouds resonate and all inside are consumed by its dark embrace.

text: This music couldn't be more dull and plodding if it tried.

author: leptonsoup337

text: And if you're wondering, 3 of the other songs are BoF5's Electric Power Building, Legaia 2's Lost Forest, Old Miltia from this game. All because of me playing them while studying.
author: SupraDarky

text: Believe it or not, this is actually in my Top 5 Most Played game songs on my computer. Mostly due to those endless nights studying. Can't really explain why. I really associate it with night time, sitting in front of my computer, studying with one little desk lamp turned slightly on.
author: SupraDarky
